name: Optimism
plot: Optimism - is a mental attitude reflecting a belief or hope that the outcome of some specific endeavor will be positive

name: Punctuality
plot: Punctuality - is the characteristic of being able to complete a required task or fulfill at a previously designated time

name: Responsibility
plot: Responsibility - is means being able to consciously make decisions, conduct behaviors that seek to improve oneself

name: Energy
plot: Energy person. It mean the person is perky and ready to run out in the world and do things with vigor.

name: Sociability
plot: Sociability person is someone who are friendly, welcoming and ready for activities

name: Stress resistance
plot: Stress resistance person isn't bothered by stress at all. This person just let's stress roll right off his or back.

name: Determination
plot: Determination - is a positive emotional feeling that involves persevering towards a difficult goal in spite of obstacles

name: Leadership
plot: Leadership - is a practical skill encompassing the ability of an individual to guide other individuals

name: Learning ability
plot: the ability of an individual to perform the various mental activities most closely associated with problem solving

name: Analytical skills
plot: Analytical skills are the skills required to solve complex problems

name: Team player
plot: A team player is a person who plays or works well as a member of a team or group.
